snippet: The signals of preference for the leadership of an adversary over that of the president came despite criticism from Democrats and discomfort among Republicans....
abstract: Indiana Gov Mike Pence defends Donald Trump's praise of Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin's leadership, particularly when measured against Pres Obama's leadership; comment is reaffirmation of campaign's extraordinary embrace of Putin; Hillary Clinton criticizes praise as unpatriotic and insulting both to American people and sitting president.

byline.original: By JONATHAN MARTIN and AMY CHOZICK
byline.contributor: Jonathan Martin reported from Washington, and Amy Chozick from White Plains and Charlotte, N.C.

lead_paragraph: The signals of preference for the leadership of an adversary over that of the president came despite criticism from Democrats and discomfort among Republicans.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Campaign Stands By Embrace of Putin
headline.print_headline: Vexing His Allies, Trump Keeps Up Praise of Putin

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
